creator: sebb@apache.org
text:
javax.servlet.http.Cookie.setDomain(String pattern)
has the following code:

domain = pattern.toLowerCase();

The result of this depends on the default Locale; it would be safer to use a fixed locale, e.g. Local.ENGLISH.

creator: markt@apache.org
text: Fixed in trunk. Will be in 7.0.0 onwards.
